definition: to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
variant of 說|说[shuo1]
real/true/honest/really/solid/fruit/seed/definitely
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
old variant of 話|话[hua4]

sentences.english: To tell you the truth, I did not like her. I thought she was too much enchanting.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，起初我并不喜欢她，感觉她太妖娆了。

sentences.english: So, why not speak the truth?
sentences.chinese: 既然如此，为什么不说实话呢？

sentences.english: Honestly, the rate of commi ion you are going to grant us is far too small.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，你方给我们的导航已取消怎么办佣金太少了。

sentences.english: Honestly, I don’t often think about the state of ‘emo’.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，我不常思考‘emo’的状况。
“那么最好跟他们说实话，”吉夫说。

sentences.english: To be honest I needed to check the spelling first.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，我得先看看自己有没有拼对词。

sentences.english: If he said that，he can’t be telling the truth.
sentences.chinese: 如果他说了那样的话，他不可能是说实话。

sentences.english: To be realistic a past accident makes more sense.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，说是过去的一次事故更合乎情理。

sentences.english: Well, to be honest, go to school.
Honestly, it was our most dramatic marital fight to date.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，这是我们结婚来吵得最凶的一次。

sentences.english: Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，亲爱的，我不管你屁事。

sentences.english: You should always tell the truth .
You should always tell the truth.
Upon my word, the road's pretty bumpy just here.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，这儿的路真的不平。

sentences.english: I hear a newly-invented drug can make people tell the truth.
sentences.chinese: 我听说有种新研制的药能使人说实话。

sentences.english: To tell the truth, I don't like disco.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，我不喜欢迪斯可。

definition: honestly speaking/to be frank, ...
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to appear to be/to seem as if
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
indeed/really/reliable/real/true
to think/to feel
not bad/tolerable/fortunately
really/indeed
straight/erect/to stick out (a part of the body)/to (physically) straighten up/to support/to withstand/outstanding/(coll.) quite/very/classifier for machine guns
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
though/although
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
it may be assumed that
